description: This Java class 'FinetuneController' defines a REST API controller for managing finetuning jobs, including creating, listing, retrieving, canceling jobs, and fetching logs. It interacts with 'FinetuneService' and 'DatasetService' to perform operations related to machine learning model finetuning workflows.

classes.name: FinetuneController
classes.description: Rest controller managing finetuning jobs through REST API endpoints.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new finetuning job based on the request data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all finetuning jobs.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific finetuning job by ID.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Requests cancellation of a finetuning job by ID.

methods.name: logs
methods.description: Fetches logs for a specific finetuning job.
